Debrief.Wrappers.Track

Class RelativeTMASegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Plottables
      • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.TrackWrapper_Support.BaseItemLayer
        • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.TrackSegment
          • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.CoreTMASegment
            • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.RelativeTMASegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanBePlottedWithTimeVariable, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, java.util.EventListener, CanEnumerate, Editable, GriddableSeriesMarker, HasEditables, Layer, Layers.NeedsToKnowAboutLayers, Layers.NeedsWrappingInLayerManager, Plottable, PlottablesType, Renamable, DraggableItem, SupportsPropertyListeners

    public class RelativeTMASegment
extends CoreTMASegment
implements Layers.NeedsToKnowAboutLayers
    extension of track segment that represents a single TMA solution as a series of fixes - based on an offset from a specified other track
    Author:
    Ian Mayo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RelativeTMASegment

        public RelativeTMASegment(double courseDegs,
                          WorldSpeed speed,
                          WorldVector offset,
                          Layers theLayers,
                          java.lang.String trackName,
                          java.lang.String sensorName)
        base constructor - sorts out the obvious
        Parameters:
        courseDegs - our course
        speed - our speed
        offset - offset from ownship track at start time
        theLayers -
        trackName - name of the track we're relative to
        sensorName - name of the track sensor that is holding us

      • RelativeTMASegment

        public RelativeTMASegment(RelativeTMASegment relevantSegment,
                          java.util.SortedSet<Editable> theItems,
                          WorldVector theOffset)
        kind of copy constructor. take the settings from the segment, but store the supplied cuts
        Parameters:
        relevantSegment -
        theItems -
        theOffset -

      • RelativeTMASegment

        public RelativeTMASegment(SensorContactWrapper[] observations,
                          WorldVector offset,
                          WorldSpeed speed,
                          double courseDegs,
                          Layers theLayers,
                          java.awt.Color override)
        build up a solution from the supplied sensor data
        Parameters:
        observations - create a single position for the DTG of each solution
        offset - the range/brg from the host's position at the DTG of the first observation
        speed - the initial target speed estimate
        courseDegs - the initial target course estimate
        theLayers -
        override - optional, whether to force usage of a track color. If null, the relevant sensor cut color will be used
